name: Clin N Testis
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Involvement of inguinal, pelvic, or external iliac lymph nodes  WITHOUT previous scrotal or inguinal surgery prior to presentation of the testis tumor is coded in distant metastasis, as distant lymph node involvement.

**Note 2:** Determine the size of the largest metastasis in a lymph node as documented in the pathology report to assign N, not the size of the lymph node. If the size of the metastasis is not documented, determine the size of the largest involved lymph node as documented pathologically or clinically with pathology taking priority. Do not code the size of any node(s) coded in distant metastasis.

**Note 3:** Size of lymph nodes must be known to assign N. You may use a physicianâs statement of the N category if this is the only information in the medical record. If the size of the lymph node(s) is not known, assign N1. 

**Regional lymph nodes:**
     
    Aortic, NOS:
       Lateral (lumbar)
       Para-aortic
       Periaortic
       Preaortic 
       Retroaortic
    Pericaval, NOS:
       Interaortocaval
       Paracaval
       Precaval
       Retrocaval
    Retroperitoneal, NOS
    Spermatic vein

    Regional lymph nodes, NOS
    Lymph nodes, NOS
     
**Regional lymph nodes WITH previous scrotal or inguinal surgery** 
    
    External iliac
    Inguinal nodes, NOS:
       Deep, NOS
       Node of Cloquet or Rosenmuller (highest deep inguinal)
       Superficial (femoral)
    Pelvic, NOS
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Clinical evaluation but unknown results or regional lymph node involvement not stated
Clinical evaluation done but results not documented in patient record

Metastasis with a lymph node mass 2 or less in greatest dimension OR 

Multiple lymph nodes, none more than 2 cm in greatest dimension

Single or multiple nodes not stated, size not stated

Stated as N1

Metastasis with a lymph node mass more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm in greatest dimension  OR 

Multiple lymph nodes, any one mass more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm in greatest dimension

Single or multiple nodes not stated, size stated and greater than 2 cm but less than or equal to 5 cm

Stated as N2
Metastasis with a lymph node mass more than 5 cm in greatest dimension
Clinical N is not defined for the specific site/histology

No clinical evaluation of regional lymph nodes
Cancer first detected on surgical resection
Unknown if any clinical assessment performed
